title: Asian Stocks Rise After Tech Boosts US Equities: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks advanced after a rebound in tech and robust economic data boosted US equities. Oil held gains after its biggest jump since October.
content: Asian stocks advanced after a rebound in tech and robust economic data boosted US equities. Oil held gains after its biggest jump since October.
